PHRASE.LANG:
What smells better than a fresh cup of brew in the morning?

 A steaming hot bowl of miso soup, of course!
 And little cousin Miso will make you feel all snuggly and warm as he rides on your shoulder.[#Legal]

Qu'est-ce qui peut bien sentir plus bon que l'odeur d'un bon café le matin ?

 Un bol bien chaud de soupe miso, bien sûr !

 Le petit cousin Miso vous tiendra chaud à coup sûr posté sur votre épaule.[#Legal]

Was riecht besser als eine Tasse heißer Tee oder Kaffee am Morgen?

 Eine dampfende Schüssel Miso-Suppe natürlich!
 Und wenn der kleine Cousin Miso dabei auf deiner Schulter sitzt, sorgt er dafür, dass du dich ganz kuschlig warm fühlst.[#Legal]

Quale profumo migliore di una bella tazza di caffé la mattina?

 Ma è ovvio, il profumo di una zuppa di miso bollente!
 E il piccolo cugino Miso ti farà sentire caldo e coccolato mentre ti accompagnerà sulla tua spalla.[#Legal]

¿Hay algo que huela mejor que una taza de café recién hecho por las mañanas?

 ¡Un tazón de sopa de miso bien caliente, naturalmente!
 Y el primito Miso te transmitirá una sensación cálida y agradable subido a tu hombro.[#Legal]
なんだかホッとする香りが漂う、コーヒーが好きなミソが肩に乗った、大豆風味の塊魂Tシャツです。[#Legal]
커피를 좋아하고, 그 존재만으로도 안심이 되는 된장이 어깨에 걸터앉아 있는 괴혼 티셔츠입니다. 약간 구수한 냄새가 납니다.[#Legal]

What smells better than a fresh cup of brew in the morning?

 A steaming hot bowl of miso soup, of course!
 And little cousin Miso will make you feel all snuggly and warm as he rides on your shoulder.[#Legal]
喜歡洋溢著讓人心神寧靜香味的咖啡的Miso坐在肩膀上，是充滿大豆風味的塊魂T恤。[#Legal]
喜歡洋溢著讓人心神寧靜香味的咖啡的Miso坐在肩膀上，是充滿大豆風味的塊魂T恤。[#Legal]

What smells better than a fresh cup of brew in the morning?

 A steaming hot bowl of miso soup, of course!
 And little cousin Miso will make you feel all snuggly and warm as he rides on your shoulder.[#Legal]
